name: Doduo

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

flavorText: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints. LV. 10 #84

strengths: Zero retreat cost provides complete mobility and flexibility
50 HP is solid for a Basic Pokemon
Fury Attack requires only 1 Colorless energy, working with any energy type
Fighting resistance (-30) provides excellent defense against Fighting Pokemon
Can potentially deal 0, 10, or 20 damage, with 20 being competitive for a Basic
weaknesses: Damage output is completely coin-flip dependent and inconsistent
Average damage of 10 (with two flips) is below par for competitive play
Can flip two tails and deal 0 damage, wasting a turn
No guaranteed damage output makes it unreliable
synergies: PlusPower can add 10 damage to whatever Fury Attack deals
Defender helps Doduo survive longer despite coin flip inconsistency
Item Finder can retrieve Trainer cards to support Doduo
Works well with decks that need flexible, low-cost attackers
Computer Search can help find evolution cards for Dodrio
counters: Consistent attackers that don't rely on coin flips
